lore: Though many Elementasaurs went extinct ages ago, some survive to this day, whether naturally or by other means.\n\nRather than roar, the Thunder-Rex thunders like a summer storm. Its body stores atmospheric electricity like an organic battery and can unleash it all at once when attacking. Ancient tablets from a human clan depict it as the messenger of angry godsâ€”and rightly so: once it locks onto its prey, no rock or wall can stop it.
menagerieDialog: (It's lounging peacefully, occasionally snorting small puffs of elemental energy.)
RAWR! Time to show these puny creatures what real power looks like!
The wisdom of the ancients and the power of the elements are mine to command. What would you like to know?
My hide is infused with primal magic. Nothing can harm me!
(It's stomping around, leaving trails of elemental energy in its wake.)
name: Thunder-Rex
